website_summaries.verdict: One of the few ergonomically designed bar stools that add additional comfort instead of just a place to sit for a good drink.
pros: Lightweight metals make the bar stools easy to move for different arrangements
Stands out for its comfort, as the seat is large and comfortable for sitting for extended periods of time
cons: Large backs won’t fit properly with some lower bar tables

customer_reviews.title: Good stool for average adult size
customer_reviews.text: These are quite sturdy and when pulled up to counter height, you sit about chest high with the counter.. like sitting at a table. The next height up, which I have, are better suited for smaller children (ages 5-12 say) but these are good for adults looking to have a bar height feel. I prefer the next height up because of my height of 5'3". These are still great for average sized adults. No issues with construction which only involves attaching the back of the stool. Overall, nice.
customer_reviews.author: A & J

customer_reviews.title: Great stools! Customizable!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Crisp white smooth finish;very sturdy. The seats are black with visible wood grain which turned out to look too dark for me, so I painted them a happy green and then sanded to reveal the dark grain again. Perfectly antiqued with 30 minutes of work for the pair. Seats come off with screws.
customer_reviews.author: libertymom4

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs, easy to assemble, quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for our "urban farmhouse" kitchen. They come in 2 pieces and easily screw on with 2 screws each. The seat size is a bit small and I was hoping the chairs were a bit sturdier, but the height is right for the counter and they look nice. Also one of the seat's wood has a crack down the center, which I wish would have been caught in a quality check before sending.
customer_reviews.author: GretchCannon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute stools at a great price! I ordered four stools with wood seats in bronze for our kitchen counter. We've gotten lots of compliments on them and I saw the same ones at a trendy coffee shop in town. They're not extremely heavy-duty, but for the price they seem to be holding up to use by kids pretty well. **Update: Seven months later and these stools are holding up great with kids. We ordered the matching chairs for our dining area and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Northwoodsmom

customer_reviews.title: A lot of extra trouble but was worth it because of the good price. I bought 4 backless stools too
customer_reviews.text: Two major flaws, be careful if you have wood floors. First, they are only 23.5, not 24" as described. Second, the plastic end caps are not parallel to the floor but slightly angled, so the felt pads I added kept slipping off. I ended up spending another $24 for rubber caps and nail-on felt pads, which look okay with the gun metal color and seem to be working. They also make the stools nearly 1" taller. A lot of extra trouble but was worth it because of the good price. I bought 4 backless stools too, so the $24 covered all 8.
customer_reviews.author: Thought you should know

customer_reviews.title: Love these bar stools
customer_reviews.text: Love these bar stools! They're very farmhouse. I know some reviewers said theirs were scratched or dinged but mine were fine. Someone else said that they were small. I replaced other barstools with ease and the seat was the exact same size. I think the seat is a pretty standard size. They came in two pieces so you just have to screw four screws in. They even came with the Allen wrench to do it. The color is a little bit darker than I thought it was going to be but I love it. They also shipped a lot faster then it said when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy stools!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools! Perfect for rustic/modern farmhouse kitchen. Shipment was fast and arrived in great condition. I love how they do not take up much space yet provides extra comfortable seating. If you’re on the bigger side, the seat size might be a little smaller but as to weight capacity, I don’t think it will be an issue. It can easily hold up to 200lbs or even more. Chairs seem to be very sturdy and well made. Would buy again if needed. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: May@36

customer_reviews.title: Leg is bent. Manufacturer will not replace
customer_reviews.text: After I put the the chairs together and put them at my bar, I noticed one wobbled. The tip of one leg was bent about 90 degrees. The box is too big for me to wrap up and pack it up to be returned, besides, I am a handicapped senior citizen. I will get my son to come over and see if he can bend it back as best as he can. I called the manufacturer and cannot send me a new base for the stool. What can I do now for a useless stool as I am disabled and the stool is rather large?
customer_reviews.author: AmaJoanne Burnettzon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Design and Appeal
customer_reviews.text: These bar stool chairs were beautiful and easy to assemble. Unfortunately, I had to return these because I bought them before measuring the height of my counter and these bar stools were too high for what they were needed for. Nonetheless, an amazing product that adds the perfect touch of industrial with a bit of farmhouse due to the wood. The only issue I can comment on was the dimension of the actual seat, although it was comfortable, it was a bit too small for me and may be for bottom-curvy women (aka if you have a booty LOL).
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bar stools for my farmhouse/industrial look. There were a few bends/damage in the material on the backs of stool which is why im giving 4 starts but luckily my husband was able to bend and correct with his tools. The stools came already assembled...all you have to do is screw in the backs on the chairs (took about 5 minutes) overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Visually appealing not comfortably functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gun metal set and they fit perfect in my tiny kitchen. I love the rough metal detail on the legs and exposed welds, very industrial/unfinished. The seat is small, but so am I. However, I don’t see myself hanging out on these chairs for a long period of time and I wouldn’t ask my elderly family to have a seat on these. They’re more visually appealing than comfortably functional. Which I’m ok with since I don’t sit at the table very long anyway and these chairs are the first thing you see walking into the room.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: We got a pair of these chairs because they were the closest match to some chairs we found at the local Marshall's and have liked a lot. The Marshall's chairs are comfortable because the back isn't rigid and straight, it's curved. These chairs are super uncomfortable. Although we only end up using them when we have company, I am reminded how awful they feel when I sit on them (because I would NEVER let my guests feel such discomfort). They're fine as far as they look and their sturdiness, but jeez, they are murder on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Lady

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of garbage. Opened up the box only to find the chairs bent to hell. I had to beat on the chairs to get them lined up to how they are supposed to be. The packaging is complete crap. It looks good once it's assembled but the fact that I had to beat it into place is ridiculous. Not to mention there's sticker/tape residue all over the entire chairs. Definitely do not recommend. Crap product.
customer_reviews.author: fmi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: These Bar Stools are very sturdy and they were super easy to put together. The only thing that I do not like is that you can see the screws. I wish they were the same color as the metal or had something to cover the screws.
customer_reviews.author: J&M Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice stool but not top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this industrial look and love the look of them. Great height for counter top. Love the gym metal color. Although I was looking for industrial look I was not expecting all the scratches and grinder marks at weld spots. But not a location where they will be used often so I’ll keep them. If I had bought for every day use in my kitchen I would not use and would have returned. But for the price and for what I needed them for they will work. Super easy to assemble. Had them together in about 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: L. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: We love how these look at our bar
customer_reviews.text: We love how these look at our bar. We have a bar height countertop island in our kitchen and these fit great. As other reviews have mentioned, the seat is rather small. It works for us so we can put more barstools in the space. It’s not a comfortable chair to sit in for hours but a good option for casual seating at a bar. The wood grain on the seat is really nice. Installing the back Rest was very easy. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect look for the bar in my converted factory apartment
customer_reviews.text: I've had these stools for a few months. They're reasonably comfortable and quite sturdy. My boyfriend weighs about sixty pounds more than the proclaimed max weight these chairs can handle and they show no sign of fatiguing as he uses them regularly. Sleek looking and industrial style lends itself nicely to my apartment unit which is in a converted old factory from the early 1900s, so if you have a loft-style place or something similar, these will look great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is made of metal and sturdy as hell. No doubt about it. Perfect height for kitchen island. Lowest prices among other products as well. I only knocked off 1 start because of the details in the pics. Also, the size of the wooden area is smaller than I thought. If you have a big butt, I don’t suggest you to buy this cuz you will def not feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Agent329

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the look
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look...well made...shipped great...but the seat is very short...and if you are a larger person..not the stool for you..I hate the way it hits the back of my thighs...I'm a full figure girl and not comfortable at all..but I will keep them for the look in my kitchen..and find ones that fit us perfect when out shopping some time
customer_reviews.author: susan bowman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in 1 box with both chairs. I was able to carry the box from my apartment lobby and up to my apartment (like 300 yard walk) without any problems. They are super cute!! There is literally 1 step to put them together. It says that it comes with rubber stoppers to put on the legs, but they are already attached (so skip that 2nd step). 4 screws to put it together, so super super easy. Love the industrial look of them too!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah N

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny seat, not for any regular use. Possibly better comfort to use as a stool and not assemble the backrest. I also had trouble deciding the height, the bar height would probably have been better, these are sort of an in between, neither a chair or bar so not as useful as I had expected. Looks just like picture and seems well made, doesn't look cheap. Aligning the back was a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Get cushions. Not comfortable at all and super small seat- I hope ya butt is little. I waited a few weeks for these in anticipation they would be perfect in my kitchen but once I assembled them and sat on one I wasn’t wowed or even happy with them. They are just ok and not worth the money or the extended wait time.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Renea Stotler

customer_reviews.title: Not For Big Butts
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are really beautiful and look amazing in my kitchen. The chair seat is a lot smaller than I anticipated. So if you, or any guests that are a bit ... um... wider in the rear end, then don't ask them to take a seat. The chairs will make them question their rear end size and doesnt make for the best conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Hannawacker

customer_reviews.title: Dinges everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy, but scratches and dinges everywhere on stool and it’s not from shipping. See photos. The scrapes and scratches are under the top coat polyurethane, these were over looked by manufacture at factory. Terrible, hard to ship back, stuck with it now. Ship and sold by amazon, no quality control.
customer_reviews.author: justnc

customer_reviews.title: Returned Immediately
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Both bases were uneven and wobbled, even with the rubber feet in place. My best guess is that the cross bars that are welded up under the seat are not put on correctly or the bases are getting bent by the way they are packaged. Their only suggestion was to return it. Manufacturer does not offer a solution or replacement parts. The seating area also is very small and does not seem like a good seat for an adult. It seems better suited for children. Seemed cheaply made and not very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: jsandvold

customer_reviews.title: Good stool for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money they are a great stool. The backs I wouldn’t say are exactly bombproof. If you really lean back hard on them I would think you could bend them. I probably wouldn’t use them on a daily basis if you weighed over 220. The seat bottom is relatively small and the backs may not support a larger person. They do have kind of a cool distressed look on them I don’t for all they do look good.
customer_reviews.author: David Nicoll

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put together and cute. However they are pretty small and not comfortable to actually sit in for more then a few minutes. The seat itself is more for the size for a child or a tiny adult. The height is good for my bar and they look really nice. I think from reading the other reviews you can easily modify the seat to be more comfortable. I chose these bc of the look of them not so much for long term seating options. So unless; you’re small, modify it or don’t mind the discomfort, I’d say pick something larger
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product it was quick and easy to assemble. However my only complaint is if you’re looking for comfort to sit for long periods of time these are not for you. Also these do have pretty small seats my mom who is over weight complained about the seat being narrow. Just an honest review but it’s been a great edition to my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy and look great
customer_reviews.text: I assembled these single-handed and they were so easy. They will require some tightening from time to time but nothing bothersome. They loom great, just like the pictures. I love the unique staining on each one and every seat is different. They have character. They are very easy to clean too with just a wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color and Bent/Warped
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the seats I received are not white, they are a light powder blue. This became more obvious once I set them against the white furniture I have. Secondly, the area where the seat backs attach to the stool was bent on both seats so they can’t even be attached.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaBless

customer_reviews.title: EASY Assembly!!  Great price, nice farmhouse/industrial look!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and started pulling pieces out, I was totally shocked that they were practically assembled. The only thing I had to do was put the backs on which consisted of 4 bolts each. They are very sturdy and come with rubber on the very bottom of the legs, so I have no worries about them scratching up the wood floors. I like the farmhouse look as it goes with the style we are working towards.
customer_reviews.author: April W.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: These look fabulous at my kitchen bar! The color matches great to my oil rubbed bronze faucet and hardware. My only complaint is that they are not super comfortable- especially for those with larger rears. Overall, we love the product and will figure out how to get in and out of these chairs as painless as possible as time goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ward

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect BARSTOOLS for my bar height bistro table in our mother-in-law suite. The seat is 30" high. I purchased bronze and the color is a bit darker than the photo, but it matched my table legs perfectly! There are rubber stoppers on the bottom side of the chair legs so they won't scratch up hardwood floors. The seat is small on the stool, but that's not an issue for us. A larger person might find it uncomfortable. Fabulous product, fabulous price, easy to assemble. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Cha Cha Charley

customer_reviews.title: Double check the size of the seat portion
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and easy to assemble, I’m 9 months pregnant and out both together within 5 minutes. My only complaint is the size of the seat itself, we swapped our backless stools like these for the safety of our two toddlers and the backless ones (different brand) definitely had larger seats but it’s works for us since our toddlers are the main users in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out
customer_reviews.text: What in the crap of junk! There’s no good in these. How are you selling this?! Rusted and chipped. “Please have a seat on my brand new rusted chairs... OH. HERES A TETANUS SHOT FOR YOUR SEAT ..” no thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just received these. They’re awesome!! Nice and sturdy. I was surprised how heavy they are. They were very easy to put together. They came with 4 screws each and an Allen wrench. They easily screw right in securely. Directions were included, but not needed. The only thing I didn’t like were the product stickers on the legs of them. They were very hard to remove. They came in perfect condition and they’re perfect bar height. LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: kt beth

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This set of barstools is working out great in my remodeled kitchen. My kids can sit easily in them with just enough of a "side" to hold my youngest in the seat. I have the copper color which I would say is more of a bronze/grey. There is no red in the color. The wood seat is a nice deep brown. True to the color in my photo. For the price I am very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous chairs, easy to assemble and semi sturdy... however, they are extremely uncomfortable! I thought that maybe it was just our big booties, but after having several rounds of guests, the consensus is, they are awful. Lovey to look at, awful to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Beret

customer_reviews.title: OUCH! And so small!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so tiny in the seat area that a kids bottom can barely fit on them. They are unfortunately terribly uncomfortable to sit in. And mine arrived without one of the the chairs back rests. Which we have to call and order again for them to send. Im bummed, because the looks of these are nice. Mine arrived with no scratches or dents but the seats are hard as cement and so small!
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but the seats then self are tiny and rough. Debating about returning or refinishing the seat so no one gets splinters. As for the sturdiness looks like they will hold up well. My kids have already knocked them over twice.. we will see if it continues.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to order these being unable to see them in person. I had also read some reviews saying they had arrived damaged. However I was extremely pleased with the outcome. I ordered 2 sets of these with the back and 1 backless set. The 6 stools came in 3 large boxes. They we're delivered quickly and in good shape. One did have one small bend, but it was fixed easily. They sit comfortably and appear sturdy! These were a great buy and I'm so glad we took the chance!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, and I'm so glad I bought them. I would not have noticed the small seat if no one had mentioned in comments so I'm glad I didn't let that deter me. I was, however, glad I read about the intentional "beat up" look of the bar stools so I knew that was normal. I love these at our kitchen counters. They feel solid, and have a great modern look for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not for adult buttocks...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived timely. Easy put together (only two parts). And since it’s all welded there is not an issue with legs bending or buckling. The only issue I have is that the seat is so narrow with the backrest attachment that as an adult you have to sit on the edge or only fit one butt cheek in the seat. My kids however love it and it’s super cute. Just wish there was more room for me to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them and easy to install with a little strength
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Had to manhandle one of the chairs to install but other than that they were mainly easy to assemble - the only thing needed to be installed was the back to the bottom - one piece and done! Looks very nice and seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quality Value
customer_reviews.text: I specifically looked for this brand DHP because I ordered a set of Eames style chairs on a whim. The quality, value and speedy shipment were definitely the reasons I opted to look for their brand furnishings. As far as the bar stools the same applies. I received the shipment packaged perfectly and super speedy. Way before the expected delivery date. I put them together quickly (I ordered 2 sets) it took me less than 20 minutes to put together. All the screws, Allen key and parts were there and aligned correctly. The chairs are beautiful and are a great addition to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair but small seat
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute and perfect fory kitchen. The only downfall is they are not very wide. I'm not very big and I can barely fit on the seat. So as far as comfort they are the worst, I wish they were wider.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Powell

customer_reviews.title: Inspect before keeping these stools!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to these bar stools to fit our new modern farmhouse look, but once I got them out of the box and put together and looked at them I realized the metal had markings all over it. Makes the stools look dented and scratched. So I hurried up and took pictures and disassembled them to go back to Amazon for a return. The box they came in was not damaged. So it seems like the product is faulty or that’s how they are supposed to look? But I wouldn’t have wanted them knowing they came like that.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Rust within two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied till I saw what appears to be rust under the clear Coat. Now they are looking gross. Not sure what’s going with these chairs but we’ve only had them a few weeks. Would be nice to get replacement chairs for the ones starting to rust .not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for kitchen bar
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these chairs. They were priced very reasonably, and look amazing in our kitchen. Sturdy enough. My husband was able to easily put four chairs together in one evening.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bronze copper ones. Absolutely love them. Perfect!! They came safely packaged and almost put together besides the backs. Also very fast shipping! Only took 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Jo white

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Packaging was done very well wrapped in foam pieces for protection. 4 screws with a provided Alan key was super simple to put the back of on. Great price, like $79 at the time I bought and I feel like I hit the jack pot since stores charge more than that for one locally.very sturdy feel to them. Ordered on Wednesday night and received Friday! May order 2 more highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER HIME

customer_reviews.title: Best high top chairs ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and perfect for my kitchen island. I didn’t have any problems putting theme together and it was just I that put them together. The wood and metal are in great condition and very durable. The pricing is spot on. Overall I have no complaints with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought counter height chairs for my toddlers to use at our kitchen table. They didn't cost much more than a dedicated booster seat and look much better. They wrap around the sides a little which helps keep the kids from falling off the side.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute! But not for big bums.  😉
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look awesome. But the seats are just so small. Not comfortable to sit on for very long. Great size for my kids. But adults, not so much. Wish they had made the seats a bit wider. They really are great looking chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great valve...seat too small. Child size seat.
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed that I didn't realize or it wasn't mentioned in the ad.. how wide the seat was ....very small only would be comfortable for a child to sit on. Otherwise I like them a lot
customer_reviews.author: Memaw Patton

customer_reviews.title: Wooden seat is just too small
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very cute (mine had a broken leg, but they shipped a new box out to me immediately). The ONLY complaint I had with them was the seat is very small. I needed these for bar seating and they're just too small. There are similar chairs with a 14" seat that is more appropriate for adults - this seat is 12"x12" - a little larger than a sheet of paper. Yea.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marozzi

customer_reviews.title: These LOOK great, they match my kitchen and dining table really ...
customer_reviews.text: These LOOK great, they match my kitchen and dining table really well, but they are mostly for decoration. They are pretty uncomfortable and the seat is small. Overall, I like them since I don't plan on sitting on them too often, but don't buy these for something you will use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and great price
customer_reviews.text: I love to read as many reviews as I can about a product before buying. I looked at all kinds of stools within my budget and boy did these chairs live up to the hype. Easy to assemble and look great. I cant agree more with most of all the positive reviews left on here about these stools. Trust me I'm pretty picky about things and I cant find anything wrong with these.. Must buy if you looking for a great stool at a great price. no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These look great.
customer_reviews.text: I love these in my kitchen with my newly remodeled farmhouse rustic look. The backs are so easy to attach. The seat is not made for larger rears so keep that in mind. Overall great purchase and good quality. I thought the seat was a little darker than pictured but still looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Littrell

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for island seating and the seat is way too small. I'm not heavy and my butt barely fit on the seat. Returning for a more comfortable option.
customer_reviews.author: AMAKP

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots
customer_reviews.text: Chairs came fast, but there were rust spots all over the both legs of the stools. So bummed we have to send these back.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anders

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed even though they are Nice sturdy stools but missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Barstools are nice, modern & sturdy but missing hardware is a bit frustrating. When you don’t have time to go into a store you order online & hope they send you all the right parts. When they don’t it’s such a pain the ass having to write a novel of info just to get the screws that should have been in your shipment. Now I have to spend money & time looking for them in a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: For the price, i thought they would be a little more durable feeling and wider. This is not big booty friendly lol.... but they are nice. Couldn’t find anything else that matched my dining chairs that look exactly like them so this was my only Option. I bought some seat pillows. Makes them a big more comfortable. They’re DECENT
customer_reviews.author: paola

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stools, sturdy construction and easy assembly. I am amazed at the quality shipping materials, easy to understand pack and not a nick or scratch anywhere. My only nit pick would be to move the white paper sticker from the inside of the leg to the bottom of the seat, they clash and are not very friendly to remove.
customer_reviews.author: sagebrush

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect!! They are sturdy and quite comfortable even without cushions. The wood on the seats is way more beautiful in person. Highly recommend if these are your style!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent chairs
customer_reviews.text: For the purpose of chairs they are fine, but the product itself looks cheaply made. The welding/furnishings are awful at all the joints of the product and the top of EACH chair came scratched as you can see in the pictures. Overall, I wouldn’t buy these again, I would spend more money on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and seem of great quality. I love how the backs can come off. I got the shorter counter height and it is perfect for my island, as well as my kids high chairs so they can face me and snack as I prep/cook. They also match my farmhouse aesthetic. Love everything about these!
customer_reviews.author: Lad86

customer_reviews.title: Little small in the seat but overall worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are a cute rustic type of bar stool. Very tall so make sure you do your measurements right! That way they will fit under your bar counter. This set is worth the money and we have enjoyed them at our house! Not 100% comfortable but works for a spot to sit and enjoy some quick lunch. I will sat that they're not very wide. So if you struggle with weight or feel blessed to have a curvy booty than these might not be for you! The seats are small.
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Like others who have posted, ours arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Nice farmhouse barstools
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price. I got them for $93 for the set. I wanted something with a farmhouse feel that had a back on it. These met all my expectations. They were a breeze to put together and they look great at my kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These stools are perfect. They look great, are strong and seem like they will last for years. They were easy to put together and I appreciate the tools needed came with them. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a rustic addition to their bar or counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern farmhouse chic!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is a little small however they look so chic in our kitchen. This style is really popular right now. I would say our home decor is modern farmhouse and these really are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Caballero

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: One of the stools were DAMAGED. I am super disappointed.... This was a Christmas present and I really don't want to send it back because I have to take it apart, haul a giant box to ups store, and pay for shipping. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and very good looking stools!
customer_reviews.text: I received these three days after I placed the order, they were very easy to assemble It took less than 10 minutes and everything you need is in the box. They look very nice and feel sturdy. I have seen these stools in other stores for 60 dlls more than what I paid here. I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Distressed look is more like poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Just put these together. Seems sturdy enough but the rear mounting plate was bent and the “distressed” look, looks more like somebody didn’t complete their work. Clear coat over weld blends is pretty amateur. I would return them but the wife is ok with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the chairs is great. The only issue I have is the seat size. A larger built person would have issues sitting in the chair comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Ebling

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing! I had been wanting this style barstool for a while but they are usually so expensive (This particular style in general). Got these as they were the cheapest and they are definitely worth the purchase! Very sturdy, come just as displayed in the photos, we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these gunmetal stools with the wood seats. Easy to put together and very sturdy. They're metal so they aren't cushioned at all, but the seats are nice and about as comfy as a wooden seat can be. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love my barstools! They fit perfectly is my space. They were also super easy to assemble. It’s made out of a hard material; therefore, it’s not like sitting on a fluffy cloud, but that was expected. Overall, I love the bar stools and I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Previously Assembled! Scratches on Legs!
customer_reviews.text: The package was not damaged when I opened up the box it appeared that the chairs were just thrown in a box with a little bit of packing material. When I pulled the chairs out at first I couldn’t find the screws in the Allen wrench they were loose at the bottom of the box. These chairs are clearly not brand new they definitely were assembled before and there are scratches on all of the legs. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: James R DAmbrosio

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bar stools for kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: These stools took maybe 5min to put together and look great in my kitchen. They feel sturdy- they are NOT comfortable but I bought them strictly for the style so that doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: sienna

customer_reviews.title: great looking stools
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as expected-a little earlier actually- and easy to put together. They are made for small behinds and perfect for kids. They are not man size stools... Great deal and great look for a great price. Remember, these stools do not like big butts, and they cannot lie...
customer_reviews.author: James Windisch

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality and not meant for adults
customer_reviews.text: Two sets of these came damaged right out of the box. My kids love them they are perfect for littles, (4 and 5) but we will need to buy something for adults bc they are not suitable for adults.
customer_reviews.author: jessica hirt

customer_reviews.title: Cute but wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 24 in. stools and received 30 in. (my picture shows it next to a 24 in. chair - major difference.) Heart-broken bc now I have to wait until mid-March for the correct pair. They're super cute and seem sturdy. Will update review when the new, correct set arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Bretagne

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, love the design! Used to stage a house, and can’t wait to bring them home! People also love them walking in the door.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Seat is small but it's still nice...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom, she loves them...the seat is small so heavier set people might find this very uncomfortable. My mom and kids are small, so the seats are fine for them...I would prefer a larger seat.
customer_reviews.author: HandyMomMarisolTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Small seat
customer_reviews.text: The seat area on this chair is pretty small. I bought these for the Welcome Center at our church and many have complained that the seat is too small to sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid and a nice look. Comfortable for people of all sizes. Easy to keep clean. The legs do not damage hardwoods. Have had them for a couple months and have not had to tighten them up at all. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Good and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is GREAT. But we are heavy kitchen area sitters . We bought 6 of them for my extended island in our kitchen. Now theyre a squeeze but my only issue with them is that they bend at the where metal and the seat meet.
customer_reviews.author: leisha

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were delivered on time. This was a gift to my daughter. One was a little off balance, but she didn’t want to return it due to the process it takes for returns. I told her to get self stick thick furniture felt pads to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: These are really Target brand. But they are very sturdy, it was just 4 bolts to put them together and they look very nice! Perfect addition to our kitchen Island !
customer_reviews.author: S. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! Bought these for my daughters apartment and they do the job. The wooden seat is not the most comfortable but that can easily be fixed with a cushion (as shown in the picture). The bronze is a great color and matches everything!
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: A Good 'Industrial Look' Item
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made by me on behalf of my boss who is doing some home redecorating. I assume it is 'The Bees Knees' as I have not heard anything - positive or negative - about them since their arrival.
customer_reviews.author: JANET A. BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the screws. I cannot connect the backs to the stools because I don’t have screws. The product arrived missing important parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I ordered charcoal color, but received antique gun metal instead. I asked for a replacement and received antique gun metal again. After 2 phone calls to CS, I’ll live with antique gun metal color. The stools are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Clee

customer_reviews.title: Narrow seat,  read dimensions carefully
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stools however, I only gave 3 stars due to the comfort. The seat is very narrow and will accommodate a child easily. Not so much for an adult. The barstool needs to be wider, that’s my only issue. Great color, and definitely goes with the farmhouse trend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are the greatest addition to my dining area thus far. Super easy assembly, maybe spent 10 minutes on both. Dimensions on the seat are a little narrow, but overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like a child's chair
customer_reviews.text: The seat is very narrow and the wood is rough. Feels more like a child's seat. Not comfortable for average size adult. The metal is very sturdy and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: NMFW

customer_reviews.title: They make my butt look too big. Because it is too big for these seats.
customer_reviews.text: These are not made for the typical momma booty. I reserve these for the kids. Tiny butts only. They look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for my kitchen counter! They came very easy to assemble. I agree with many other reviewers that these are not for people who have wider bottoms, but they work for us. They are really cute and the best price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cowan

product_meta.title: DHP P Luxor Metal Counter Stool with Wood Seat and Backrest Bronze
product_meta.description: Size:Counter HeightThe Luxor 24" Metal Counter Stool with a wood seating surface from DHP is highly fashioned with a distressed finish and antique metal design. This urban counter stool is a classic statement piece, making it a perfect dining and conversation seat.
feature_bullets: Industrial design with distressed wood seat and distressed metal frame. Sold in a set of 2
Compact and Lightweight, requires simple assembly.
Seat Height: 24", Stool dimensions: 17.5"L x 18"W x 39.5"H. Seat Dimensions: 12"L x 12"W. Weight limit: 200 lb
This product is designed for home and commercial use. Perfect for restaurants, cafés, and more.
Performance and durability tested in accordance with applicable ANSI/BIFMA standard

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars171 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
